trends: There have been 38 other sightings in South Bend
There was one other sighting in South Bend on or around February 16th 2009
Summary: Saw an unusal large object with several white lights hovering in the sky.
divs: Sighting DetailsWhile waiting to turn left off roosevelt road onto 31, I looked to my right and saw what I thought at first to be a tower in the distance.. northeast. I saw what appeared to be 3 or 4 bright white lights but i could not make out the shape of the object. I realised that the towers in the area had red lights and it struck me as weird that I had never seen anything in that part of the sky before. It was quite big and and odd, probably a half mile or so away. I turned right onto 31 south in an attempt to see it more clearly. As I got closer looking to my left I saw it was a rectangular shape and I thought i saw something underneath it as well. But, I was driving and could not take my eyes off the road long enough to sharpen my focus. As I turned left onto miller road, It began to move slowly down and away from me. I began to lose my visual because of trees,etc. .When I looked back again it was gone. I pulled over and searched the sky and saw nothing. I did this 2 more times as I slowly drove miller road. The night was clear and as it darkened I saw a fair amount of stars, including a planet. I have never seen anything like the object. The lights seemed peculiar to me as well. They did not blink. And they were quite bright. And I was aware of no sound coming from it. MJ
